page.title: 04General Information (cont)
page.content:
The underlying rock is mainly millstone grit, and approximately 32 inches of rain fall annually. The parkland is grazed by livestock and deer, and produces a very pleasant scene with groups, and individual trees, of all ages and small blocks of woodland. The village of{Edensor}with its' church is completely within the 12 Km block. The majority of{Pilsley}village together with the school is also within this block, as are several farmhouses and cottages. The main A623 road runs roughly north and south following the River Derwent.
The following pages written by residents of the area describe a way of life steeped in tradition and loyalty.
